text.div:
Id: gravitate-alicia
status: final
Type: Patient summary Document
Subject: alicia Gravitate
Sections:
Title: Problem List
Code: Problem list Reported (11450-4)
Entry: HIV
Entry: Trigeminal neuralgia
Entry: Depression
Entry: Overweight
Title: Medication Summary
Code: Hx of Medication use (10160-0)
Entry: BIKTARVY Bictegravir/Emtricitabine/Tenofovir Alafenamide 1 t QD
Entry: Calcium/Vit D
Entry: Folic Acid + Cyanocobalamin + Iodur 1 t QD
Entry: Carbamazepine 1 t TID
Entry: Orlistat 1 cp TID
Entry: St. John’s Wort 2 cp BID
Entry: Collagen and magnesium supplements

display.value: Folic Acid + Cyanocobalamin + Iodur 1 t QD
CALCIO/VITAMINA D3 ROVI 1000 mg/880 UI COMPRIMIDOS EFERVESCENTES

text.div: Age: 28 years. I live with my boyfriend. PhD Student Interests: I love reading and walking outdoors with my dog. I also love art and photography. Health Conditions: HIV (diagnosed with 25 years) Trigeminal neuralgia Depression Overweight
